item.color_block.color_tool.tooltip.adva:
This Item can be Used to Customise Color Blocks. 
 Sneak while clicking on the Color Block to take the Color of the Block 
 Rename this Item in Anvil to an Number to set the Coloring color 
 Click on the Color Block to Color it to the settet Color
